text.intro:
NSW COVID-19 Delta outbreak June to August 2021 (v2.1)

Data source:  https://data.nsw.gov.au/nsw-covid-19-data/cases

This is a representation of the NSW Coronavirus Delta strain outbreak in the form of a network graph.

Note that NSW Health provides case data including chronology, but without explicit links between cases.

For the network graph, I've linked cases using the following method:
- Link each case to the most recent case within the same Local Government Area (LGA)
- If no previous case in the same LGA, link to most recent case in the same Local Health District (LHD)
- If no previous case in either LGA of LHD, link to most recent case 

So whilst case linkages are therefore a construct to some degree, the scale of the network is nonetheless a completely real depiction of the outbreak.
text.title: NSW COVID-19 Delta outbreak June to August 2021 (v2.1)
